Class PharmacistController

java.lang.Object
controllers.PharmacistController
public class PharmacistController extends Object
The PharmacistController class manages the interaction between a logged-in patient and the system, comprising the logic for handling the following features available to the pharmacist: 1. View Appointment Outcome 2. Update Prescription Status 3. View Medicine Inventory 4. Submit Replenishment Request 5. Logout

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(Account loggedInUser) throws Exception
      Starts the pharmacist interface, displaying a welcome message and displaying the pharmacist menu.
      Parameters:
      loggedInUser - The account of the logged-in user (pharmacist).
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while loading or interacting with pharmacist data.

    • ViewAppointmentOutcome

      public static void ViewAppointmentOutcome(String patientID)
      Calls method in AppointmentController to display appointment outcome of specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientID - ID of Patient to view appointment outcome of.

    • DispensePrescription

      public static void DispensePrescription(String patientID)
      Calls method in AppointmentController to update prescription status to dispensed of specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientID - ID of Patient to dispense medication.

    • ViewMedicalInventory

      public static void ViewMedicalInventory(ArrayList<Medicine> medicineList)
      Displays Name, Current Stock, Initial Stock, Low Level Stock of Medicine available.
      Parameters:
      medicineList - List of medicine available.

    • SubmitReplenishmentRequest

      public static void SubmitReplenishmentRequest(String filepath, ReplenishmentRequest r)
      Calls method in csvUtils to save replenishment request to be submitted.
      Parameters:
      filepath - File path where replenish requests reside.
      r - Replenishment request to be submitted.
